title: Sons of Fortune

quote_first: She tried not to show her true feelings when at
quote_last: her deputy, Phil Haskins, presented her with a complex twelve-page document that required the signature of a director before it could be sent out to the client. Haskins didn’t hesitate to remind her that they had lost two similar contracts that week.
title: Never Stop on the Motorway

quote_first: She should have been home by now.
quote_last: . Yes. It’s as if I had the date of a year on my arm. Every day is a piece of world history.
